articles.title: Germany to fire up coal stations as Russia squeezes gas supply

articles.title: A family journey to the origin of Juneteenth
articles.description: Author and journalist Mark Whitaker visits Texas, where his great-grandfather became a free man in 1865, and meets with relatives for whom Juneteenth – America's second Independence Day – has taken on a special meaning.
